dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.proto.routing.DistanceVectorRoutingProtocol
dataStructure.description:
This is the base class for defining protocols that use a distance vector routing algorithm. In this algorithm, each router sends its entire routing table in each update, but only to its neighbors. By iterating through each hop, the shortest-path spanning tree is found.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: DistanceVectorRoutingProtocol

child.name: logicalDevice5
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DeviceDVRoutingDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: logicalDevice5
